HomePage.title: Advanced AI Chat Platform
HomePage.subtitle: Experience smarter conversations with GPT IQ's cutting-edge AI technology
HomePage.featureOneDescription: Talk to our AI like you would with a human, with remarkable comprehension and context awareness
HomePage.featureTwoDescription: Get instant responses with our optimized architecture for minimal latency
HomePage.featureThreeDescription: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade encryption and privacy controls
HomePage.ctaTitle: Ready to experience the future of AI conversation?
HomePage.ctaDescription: Join thousands of users already enjoying smarter AI interactions

Chat.headline: Ask me anything about programming, tech, code debugging, or software design
Chat.disclaimer: This is an AI assistant. Information might not always be accurate.
Chat.signInToViewHistory: Sign in to view your chat history
Chat.enterToSend: Press Enter to send, Shift + Enter for a new line
Chat.headlineSubtitle: Your intelligent assistant powered by advanced AI. Ask questions, get answers, and discover insights.

Login.title: Welcome back
Login.subtitle: Sign in to continue to your account

Signup.title: Create an account
Signup.subtitle: Sign up to get started with GPT IQ

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
ForgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link

VerifyEmail.title: Verify your email
VerifyEmail.subtitle: Check your inbox to verify your account
VerifyEmail.description: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.

Account.pageDescription: Manage your personal information and account settings
Account.title: My Account

profileSection.title: Profile Information
profileSection.description: Update your personal information and profile picture
profileSection.photoHelp: Click on the profile picture to upload a new image. JPG, PNG or GIF, max 5MB.
profileSection.imageTypeError: Please upload an image file (JPG, PNG, GIF)
profileSection.imageSizeError: Image size must be less than 5MB

securitySection.connectedAccountsDescription: Manage your connected accounts and sign-in methods
securitySection.changePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure
securitySection.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
securitySection.accountSecurityDescription: Your account security status and recommendations
securitySection.accountProtectedDescription: Your account has strong authentication methods enabled

History.pageDescription: Browse and manage your previous conversations
History.title: Chat History
History.subtitle: See your previous conversations
History.startConversationDescription: Start a new chat to see your history here.
History.tryDifferentSearch: Try a different search term or clear filters.
History.pinnedConversationsDescription: Important conversations you've pinned will appear here.
History.archivedConversationsDescription: Conversations you've archived will appear here.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.pageDescription: Manage your application preferences and account settings

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize how the application looks and feels

chat.title: Chat Settings
chat.autoSendDescription: Automatically send messages when you press Enter
chat.enableSpeechDescription: Enable speech output for AI responses
chat.messageHistoryDescription: Number of messages to keep in the chat history

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.saveHistoryDescription: Store your chat conversations for future reference
privacy.allowUsageDescription: Help us improve by sharing anonymous usage statistics
privacy.allowErrorsDescription: Automatically send error reports to help us fix issues
privacy.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
privacy.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all of your data from our servers.
